news.markdown:
**SUCCESSFUL FUNDING FROM ARTS COUNCIL ENGLAND**
We are delighted to share the news that we have been awarded our sixth grant from Arts Council England which will support the creation and tour of our new work _Lovely Girls_. 

Featured on the Arts Council website: **[Click HERE](https://www.artscouncil.org.uk/news/comedy-dance-theatre-bit-hiccup-secures-%C2%A340773-national-lottery-funding)** to read the full article.


**BRAND NEW SHOW!** 

We are currently in creation for our new work  _Lovely Girls_ which will present as a work in progress 7th/8th November at The Wardrobe Theatre in Bristol and Chisenhale Dance Space in London! Tickets are ON SALE NOW (see performance dates below)

Tickets are also on sale for our Open Level Workshop @ The Wardrobe Theatre, 7th November. Spaces for this workshop are limited so book now to avoid disappointment! 
**[Book onto our workshop HERE](http://thewardrobetheatre.com/livetheatre/workshop-hiccup-project/)**

events.markdown:
**"It's Okay, I'm Dealing With It."**
13th October (World Mental Health Day): Dance Live, ABERDEEN **[Tickets](https://citymoves.org.uk/event/its-ok-im-dealing-with-it/)**



**_May-We-Go-Round?_**
18th October: Deda, DERBY **[Tickets](http://www.deda.uk.com/whats-on/hiccup-project-may-we-go-round/)**

**_Lovely Girls_** 
7th November: The Wardrobe Theatre, BRISTOL  **[Tickets](http://thewardrobetheatre.com/livetheatre/lovely-girls/)**

**_Lovely Girls_** 
8th November: The Wardrobe Theatre, BRISTOL  **[Tickets](http://thewardrobetheatre.com/livetheatre/lovely-girls/)**

**_May-We-Go-Round?_**
14th November: South Devon College, DEVON **[Tickets](https://shop.southdevon.ac.uk/product-catalogue/events/theatre-performance-tickets/maywegoround-14th-november-2018)**

**_Lovely Girls_** 
17th November: Chisenhale Dance Space, LONDON  **[Tickets](https://www.brownpapertickets.com/event/3627929)**

**_"It's Okay, I'm Dealing With It."_** 
 28th November: The Old Market, BRIGHTON **[Tickets](http://theoldmarket.com/shows/okay-im-dealing/)**

_More performance dates to be announced soon, stay tuned!_
